Ruby.en: Prevents foes from using moves known by the user.
Ruby.de: Hindert Gegner an Attacken, die d. Benutzer kennt.

Sapphire.en: Prevents foes from using moves known by the user.
Sapphire.de: Hindert Gegner an Attacken, die d. Benutzer kennt.

Emerald.en: Prevents foes from using moves known by the user.
Emerald.de: Hindert Gegner an Attacken, die d. Benutzer kennt.

FireRed.en: Prevents foes from using any move that is also known by the user.
FireRed.de: Hindert Gegner am Einsatz von Attacken, die der Anwender kennt.

LeafGreen.en: Prevents foes from using any move that is also known by the user.
LeafGreen.de: Hindert Gegner am Einsatz von Attacken, die der Anwender kennt.

Diamond.en: If the foe knows any move also known by the user, the foe is prevented from using it.
Diamond.de: Hindert Gegner am Einsatz von Attacken, die der Anwender kennt.
